definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Compare the two values we found that they are anastomose essentially.
sentences.chinese: 实验室试验数据与仿真结果比较，二者基本吻合。

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文将通过逐项对比分析，着重阐明二者的对偶性。

sentences.english: But if I cannot get both, I would take righteousness at the cost of my life.
sentences.chinese: 二者不可得兼，舍生而取义者也。

sentences.english: They should combine the comprehensive land using situation to develop the two types of residences, tog…
sentences.chinese: 这两种类型各具优劣，下面我们将二者进行对比分析。

sentences.english: Alternatively, pulleys can also be used.
sentences.chinese: 二者择一地，滑车也能被用。

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆经手术成功切除肿瘤且未再复发。

sentences.english: In criticizing and transcending over traditional metaphysics, Heidegger and Whitehead adopted different approaches but yielded the same excellent results.
sentences.chinese: 二者对传统形而上学的批判与超越具有异工同曲之妙。

sentences.english: They conducted a survey and, like researchers do, found that a bunch of variables are inter-related.
sentences.chinese: 他们只做了引证，发现二者有内在且多变的联系。

sentences.english: In either case you’re measuring and optimizing for second order effect.
sentences.chinese: 二者都是在衡量和优化优先级次高的效果。

sentences.english: You can easily harness the power of both.
sentences.chinese: 您可以方便地利用二者的强大功能。

sentences.english: Although either may be used for weft knitting, the latch needle is more common.
sentences.chinese: 二者均可用于纬编，舌针使用得更普遍一些。

sentences.english: The measurement depends on the different relationship between them.
sentences.chinese: 二者在不同的关系下，其处理方式亦有所不同。

sentences.english: In respect of asexual propagation, both of the two species can produce viviparous plantlets.
sentences.chinese: 在无性繁殖方面，二者都通过克隆生长形成胎生苗。

sentences.english: The two are inter-connected with each other and a difference between the two sides of the contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 二者是互相联系又互相区别的一对矛盾的两个方面。

sentences.english: To administer by morals and administer by law are complementary.
sentences.chinese: 德治与法治从来都是相辅相成的，二者缺一不可。

sentences.english: However, you should carefully review both during the discovery phase.
sentences.chinese: 不过，应该在发现阶段对二者进行仔细检查。

definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
one of the given (options etc)/the first/firstly
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
